_comment: Golden file: Expected mainframe output after successful card update (COCRDUPC — CHANGES-OKAYED-AND-DONE).

_knownDifferences.concurrencyMechanism: Mainframe uses field-by-field comparison (COCRDUPC.cbl:1498-1523). Migrated system uses SQL rowversion (ETag-based). Both achieve same outcome: detect concurrent modifications.
_knownDifferences.errorCollection: Mainframe returns only the first validation error (WS-RETURN-MSG-OFF flag). Migrated system collects all errors simultaneously — an intentional improvement.
_knownDifferences.characterEncoding: Mainframe uses EBCDIC with Swedish codepage. Migrated system uses Unicode (nvarchar) — supports Å, Ä, Ö plus additional Unicode letters.
_knownDifferences.expiryDayClamping: Mainframe carries original day value unchanged. Migrated system clamps day to valid range when month/year change (e.g., Jan 31 → Feb 28).
